triples.evidence: When we do that, the Fourier transform turns into a sum over all the sampled points... This is how we connect the continuous theory to the practical, digital form of the discrete Fourier transform that we use in computation.
triples.o: direct Fourier transform of the sampled signal

concepts.term: oscillating factor - what we call the kernel
